name: Dungeon Dash (RanchOnBread)
description:
Escape the dangers of the Deep Dungeon by exploring, finding more dashes, and climbing out the way you fell into the area the game mainly takes place, nicely hinted by the giant arrows pointing upwards.

Controls are in tutorial-Controllers Supported

Editor Note : There's a bug where you can't see what direction you can enter one-way platforms. Once the jam is over, I will try to fix that. Sorry if it makes certain areas more confusing to navigate!
